author: boston.com
title: Photos from HUBweek: Star-studded forum at Faneuil Hall - Massachusetts news
text: Previous -- of -- Next World-reknowned political philosopher and Harvard professor Michael Sandel (far left) hosted a star-studded forum to kick off HUBweek in Boston. Sandel was joined by (left to right) Arianna Huffington, Yo-Yo Ma, Alexis Wilkinson, Andrew McAfee, and Sherry Turkle. Jean Nagy / Boston.com Staff Previous -- of -- Next Picture from "Fenway Forum: What's the right thing to do?" Jean Nagy / Boston.com Staff Previous -- of -- Next Picture from "Fenway Forum: What's the right thing to do?"
